sgraph

Class GL3MeshRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sgraph.GL3MeshRenderer

  • public class GL3MeshRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a JOGL specific renderer for a mesh. It mandates OpenGL 3 and above. It encapsulates all the JOGL-specific code required to render a mesh, namely a VAO, VBO, number and type of primitives and the GL3 context required to call rendering functions. uses this implementation.
    Author:
    Amit Shesh
